title: Chin Mara - John (Print)
description: Chin Mara translation of the Gospel of John. Mara is a Kuki-Chin language spoken by Mara people, mostly the Tlosaih tribe living in 30 villages of Chhimtuipui district, southern Mizoram, India and the adjacent villages in Burma.

language.name: Mara Chin
language.area: Mizoram, Chhimtuipui District. 60 villages. Also in Myanmar.
